entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , New-Wes-Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to freezing drizzle or flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
